amendment.description: To establish a special committee of the Senate to investigate the awarding and carrying out of contracts to conduct activities in Afghanistan and Iraq and to fight the war on terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2476 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 316.

action.text: Amendment SA 2476 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S12571-12573, S12574-12575) To establish a special committee of the Senate to investigate the awarding and carrying out of contracts to conduct activities in Afghanistan and Iraq and to fight the war on terrorism.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2476 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 316.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2476 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 316.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2476 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
